entry.title: 12"x108" Navy Blue Taffeta Damask Flocking Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 3.08 - 425.04 (2 variants)

[About]

Measurements: 12" wide x 108"
Material: Taffeta Flocking
Seamless, 1 pc design. Edges are Hemmed.
Works beautifully with our tablecloths
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Our eye-catching taffeta flocking table runner is an ideal choice to dress up those lackluster table covers and old-fashioned tables. The seamless luster of high quality taffeta combined with the modish flocking design adds a chic appeal to these splendid runners. Create a super classy table presentation with these stylish runners spread elegantly atop your wedding or banquet tables. Pair these with our sparkling glitter accented table tops, centerpieces or vases for much exotic effect.

Additional Information:

  • Measurements: 12" wide x 108"
  • Material: Taffeta Flocking
  • Seamless, 1 pc design. Edges are Hemmed.
  • Works beautifully with our tablecloths
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

Linen Care Instructions

entry.title: Black Gold COUTURE Tulle Satin Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 6.99 - 96.46 (2 variants)

[About]

Measurements: 12" width x 108" length
Material: Tulle and Satin Fabric
Edges are Serged. Item is seamless
Works beautifully with our tablecloths
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Few fabrics are designed by the master designers, simply with the intention to stand out and glam up the bearer, whether it’s a hip celeb, or a truly posh party. This unique piece features absolutely voguish design of shimmery satin ribbons twirling and swirling into eye-catching flowers and coils atop a stunning see-through tulle. The glitzy sheen of satin ribbons coupled with glamorous sheer tulle makes this table runner a perfect designer couture fabric. Embrace the exuberance of festivity and the classiness of royalty with this exclusive runner. Design fashionable table settings with this gleaming fabric to win the admiration and fascination of your guests or audience.

Additional Information:

  • Measurements: 12" width x 108" length
  • Material: Tulle and Satin Fabric
  • Edges are Serged. Item is seamless
  • Works beautifully with our tablecloths
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

Linen Care Instructions

entry.title: 14"x108" White/Silver Floral Lace Netting Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 6.99

[About]

Measurements: 14" width x 108" length
Material: Lace netting with embellished threads
Edges are Serged. Item is seamless
Works beautifully with our tablecloths
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Sprinkle some magical fairy dust on your event’s celebration and cast a spell that will leave all your invitees absolutely bewitched by draping your plain table covers with our ethereal Fairy Dust Runners. Premium quality delicate lace fabric has been embellished with finely threaded floral and leaf design to impart an absolute mysterious fairy tale appeal to your event’s ambiance. The metallic silvery thread is inter-sewn to add a dash of surreal sparkle when you throw some spot light on it, bedazzling the onlookers majestically. These glinting silver threads not only heighten the glitz and glam of your banquet or cake tables, but also avoid the hassle of glitter shedding off. Pair this empyrean runners with our dazzling chandelier centerpiece or glitter accented stems and blossoms to create a pure divine table setting. Place it atop our square, round, or rectangle table covers either plain or accented with embroidery, sequins or lace netting.

Additional Information:

  • Measurements: 14" width x 108" length
  • Material: Lace netting with embellished threads
  • Edges are Serged. Item is seamless
  • Works beautifully with our tablecloths
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

 

Linen Care Instructions
